(:action place ; Place an item and update its status
 :parameters (?p - player ?item - object ?target - location)
 :precondition (and (inventory ?p ?item) (at ?p ?target) (suitable ?target ?item))
 :effect (and (placed ?item ?target) (not (inventory ?p ?item))

(:action blend
    :parameters (?p - player ?item1 - object ?item2 - object ?bl - blender)
    :precondition (and 
                    (at ?p ?bl)
                    (is_blender ?bl)
                    (or 
                        (and (in_blender ?bl bananas) (in_blender ?bl sorbet) (in_blender ?bl yogurt))
                        (and (inventory ?p ?item1) (blended ?bl))
                    )
                  )
    :effect (and 
                (or 
                    (and (blended ?bl) (smooth_texture ?bl))
